desc: The Paw Bottle is an elegant and portable, BPA Free smart water bottle feeder that’s designed for dogs. Making it the smartest choice …Whenever you are out with your furry friend, carry our Portable Pet Water Bottle just with the flip of the wrist, you can give your best friend a fresh drink of water.

layout.text: Pet owners! We are 100% CERTAIN that your pet find it ANNOYING to drink out of an UNCOMFORTABLE hand bowl or a paper cup outside! That ends now!
